mapper.select: select om.ID id, om.organizationid organizationid, om.membertel membertel, om.memberdesc memberdesc, om.creator creator, om.createtime createtime from file_org_member om where om.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into file_org_member
ID,
organizationid,
membertel,
memberdesc,
creator,
createtime,

mapper.update:
update file_org_member
organizationid = #{organizationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
membertel = #{membertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memberdesc = #{memberdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
